module.title: Resource: Payment
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>user_payment_accounts`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>user_payment_accounts` ( `userPaymentAccountId` int(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` int(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `paymentAccountId` int(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `provider` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`userPaymentAccountId`), KEY `userId` (`userId`), KEY `paymentAccountId` (`paymentAccountId`), KEY `provider` (`provider`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
